Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate the string that connects the two cups, showing that it transmits sound.
The student can depict how sound travels through the string by including simple labels or arrows.
The student can demonstrate that the device uses sound to send information across a distance.
The student can include features showing that the solution works over a distance by drawing the students apart.
The student can use the drawing to explain why communicating over a distance is helpful.
The student can only use specified materials like paper cups and string in the drawing.
